channel.title: Extra tools :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Discovery tools to get ip of your esp device SD tools to manage your SD card

item.title: Discovery tools
item.description: ESP3D support several discovery protocol that may need extra software to work according your operating system. SSDP (Simple Service Discovery Protocol) mDNS (multicast DNS))

item.title: SD tools
item.description: Format the SD card The capacity must not be over 8GB, 4GB is the prefered one. The sd card must be formated using Fat32 or extFat. Windows: Do not use the windows formating tool, use the tool provided by sdcard.org tool instead. OSX: please use sdcard.org tool Linux: TBDâ€¦
